Sustainability & ESG

Manage your waste impact to achieve zero waste and climate change goals

Waste meteringTM technology is a climate change solution automatically providing waste intelligence on your organization’s recycling, diversion and carbon emissions progress to track against and drive your ESG priorities.

Sustainability & ESG

Manage your waste impact to achieve zero waste and climate change goals

Waste meteringTM technology is a climate change solution automatically providing waste intelligence on your organization’s recycling, diversion and carbon emissions progress to track against and drive your ESG priorities.

Download SAMPLE REPORT

Tell us a bit about yourself to download our sample contamination reduction report. Thank you for getting in touch with us!

Diversion from landfill

ACHIEVE ZERO WASTE GOALS

Reduce waste to landfills by making sure recyclable materials are disposed of correctly. Waste characterization technology not only identifies incorrect disposal and let’s you take corrective action, but also shows you material type trends and patterns across your organization so you can make system-wide changes, like making sure all cardboard doesn’t end up at landfills.

Download sample diversion from landfill report

Diversion from landfill

ACHIEVE ZERO WASTE GOALS

Reduce waste to landfills by making sure recyclable materials are disposed of correctly. Waste characterization technology not only identifies incorrect disposal and let’s you take corrective action, but also shows you material type trends and patterns across your organization so you can make system-wide changes, like making sure all cardboard doesn’t end up at landfills.

Download sample diversion from landfill report

Download SAMPLE REPORT

Tell us a bit about yourself to download our sample diversion from landfill report. Thank you for getting in touch with us!

Carbon footprint tracking & reduction

ACCURATE MEASUREMENT MEANS MEANINGFUL ACTION

15 percent of methane emissions come from landfills. Waste metering uses accurate disposal volumes and material weights to calculate carbon emissions from landfill waste, recycling and organics⁠—no more estimates based on incorrect volume assumptions. Accurate measurement lets you take action to reduce your carbon impact over time, doing your part to tackle climate change and reduce natural resource consumption.

Download sample carbon emissions report

Carbon footprint tracking & reduction

ACCURATE MEASUREMENT MEANS MEANINGFUL ACTION

15 percent of methane emissions come from landfills. Waste metering uses accurate disposal volumes and material weights to calculate carbon emissions from landfill waste, recycling and organics⁠—no more estimates based on incorrect volume assumptions. Accurate measurement lets you take action to reduce your carbon impact over time, doing your part to tackle climate change and reduce natural resource consumption.

Download sample carbon emissions report

Download SAMPLE REPORT

Tell us a bit about yourself to download our sample carbon emission impact report. Thank you for getting in touch with us!

Automated, accurate ESG reporting

TRANSPARENCY FOR ALL STAKEHOLDERS

Get automated, accurate, standardized third-party waste intelligence about your national waste and footprint, including diversion from landfill rates and carbon footprint reduction. Track progress over time, benchmark across locations, and share your sustainability commitments to stakeholders like consumers, employees and shareholders.

Automated, accurate ESG reporting

TRANSPARENCY FOR ALL STAKEHOLDERS

Get automated, accurate, standardized third-party waste intelligence about your national waste and footprint, including diversion from landfill rates and carbon footprint reduction. Track progress over time, benchmark across locations, and share your sustainability commitments to stakeholders like consumers, employees and shareholders.

How leading brands are reporting on ESG

Quantifying Environmental Progress

See how forward-thinking companies, including Apple, ADT and Planet Fitness, are using Compology waste metering data to quantify their commitment to environmental responsibility and sustainability, tracking progress and presenting results to key stakeholders.

Explore ESG reports

How leading brands are reporting on ESG

Quantifying Environmental Progress

See how forward-thinking companies, including Apple, ADT and Planet Fitness, are using Compology waste metering data to quantify their commitment to environmental responsibility and sustainability, tracking progress and presenting results to key stakeholders.

Explore ESG reports

Cleaner recycling streams

IDENTIFY AND REDUCE CONTAMINATION

Ensure your company sends clean, high-quality recyclable materials through our domestic infrastructure by automatically identifying when a team member or guest throws away non-recyclable material into any dumpster to take corrective action. While the most common infractions include e-waste and bulky items, even too many trash bags in a recycling dumpster can send a whole load to the landfill instead of the recycling processing facility.

See the list of contaminants you can identify

Cleaner recycling streams

IDENTIFY AND REDUCE CONTAMINATION

Ensure your company sends clean, high-quality recyclable materials through our domestic infrastructure by automatically identifying when a team member or guest throws away non-recyclable material into any dumpster to take corrective action. While the most common infractions include e-waste and bulky items, even too many trash bags in a recycling dumpster can send a whole load to the landfill instead of the recycling processing facility.

See the list of contaminants you can identify

Better quality of life

IMPACT YOUR EMPLOYEES AND COMMUNITY CAN FEEL

Less garbage truck miles traveled means cleaner, quieter streets and greener cities with fewer carbon emissions. Data-defined waste collection schedules mean no overflow issues that cause rodents and unsightly dumpster corrals. Efficient, sustainable waste operations across every business and every city means a better quality of life for all.

Better quality of life

IMPACT YOUR EMPLOYEES AND COMMUNITY CAN FEEL

Less garbage truck miles traveled means cleaner, quieter streets and greener cities with fewer carbon emissions. Data-defined waste collection schedules mean no overflow issues that cause rodents and unsightly dumpster corrals. Efficient, sustainable waste operations across every business and every city means a better quality of life for all.

Socially-responsible sustainability solutions

Retail & Corporate Brokers & Facilities Services Public sector / government

Featured news

article

Fortune 500 Grainger Features Waste Metering Impact in 2021 ESG Report

article

Hear it from Apple: “We were overestimating waste.”

video

Live on CNN: Why McDonald’s restaurants are putting cameras in their dumpsters

Sustainability-enabling technology

Our rugged dumpster cameras and AI-powered waste meteringTM technology deliver fullness, content and contamination, location and service data.

  • Ultra-rugged, long-lasting dumpster camera
  • Data on dumpster fullness, floorspace, location and activity data – all tied to specific businesses or locations
  • Intuitive, artificial intelligence-powered software
  • Actionable reporting and notifications for meaningful organizational insights
Learn About the Tech

Want to learn more about our sustainability offerings?

We’ll tailor a solution for your organization.
